wikipedia_page.main: Glenn Freemantle is a British sound editor and sound designer.He was nominated at the 81st Academy Awards for Best Sound Editing for his work on the film Slumdog Millionaire. He received a second nomination and his first win in the same category for Gravity at the 86th Academy Awards.He has over 130 credits since his start in 1981.
